bug.author: George3d6
bug.summary: Probabilstic validator not recording null values in the dataset
bug.description: The probabilistic validator fails to record null values that already exist in the current validation dataset.

comments.comment: Hey, I am willing to take up this issue. Can you please let me know how can I recreate the error and which files I need to look upon.

Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Bhanu-mbvg>@Bhanu-mbvg</denchmark-link> , I'm so terribly sorry, I was taking some day off coding when you posted this and it slipped my radar once I came back. Are you still interested in working on this issue ? If so I can provide you with some guidance about how to go about it, though do keep in mind it might be a bit difficult (e.g. it might take 4-6 hours to someone unfamiliar with the mindsdb codebase to solve it and test it), but I'd be a good introduction if you're interested in using and/or contributing to mindsdb in the future :) Again, sorry for my reply being basically 2 months delayed :(
This is now fixed in the new model analyzer :)
